title: Manage Parking on Game Day
description: A venue operator needs to monitor parking lot capacity in real time and direct fans to available lots.

tasks.description: Monitor the real-time capacity of all stadium parking lots.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets data showing that Lot A and Lot B are full.

tasks.description: Update the digital signs on the roads leading to the stadium to direct new arrivals to Lot C and Lot D.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the text on the digital signs.

tasks.description: Send a push notification to the team's mobile app with parking updates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the parking update to fans.
